thread.section_title: Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Brisbane, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stay and fly - SSF gem
thread.title_full: Stay and fly - SSF gem - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton San Francisco Airport-North, Brisbane, CA - TripAdvisor

author: MaryC80
title: Stay and fly - SSF gem
text:
We booked Homewood Suites at the last minute as the first place we booked (Hampton Inn) was going to charge $20 a night to leave our car. Homewood was much more reasonable PLUS the room and service exceeded our expectations. Erich checked us in. He was very friendly and welcoming. Our room was clean and quite large, including a full kitchen- which we didn't need, but good to know for further reference. They offer complimentary wine or beer in the evening from 5-7 M-Th plus a light dinner. The dinner was very good! This particular evening they offered cream of broccoli soup, Caesar salad and fajitas plus bread sticks, chips, salsa etc. it was a full meal. Javier was our host and kept our wine glasses full.
Breakfast is also included, however we needed to leave early to catch a flight. If it's anything like the 'social hour' I'm sure it's very good too.
Everyone was very friendly. We will stay here again.
